com.spenkana.exp.searchrepos.support.io

Class UriBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spenkana.exp.searchrepos.support.io.UriBuilder

  • public class UriBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    Builds a new URI or clones an existing URI with optional updates. Setter functions are idempotent.
